column4: I am getting the error in UBUNTU soreau, that is why I am here I am running Ubuntu and I have downloaded the app but it is trying to open in Image Viewer in UBUNTU doe that make any sense to you????????

right click the file, open with..., untick the box 'remember this'

what?  Can you make a screenshot and upload it to imageshack.us  ?
